title: BRIEF-Oilex Says GSPC Commenced Formal Sale Process For Its 55% Interest In Cambay PSC
text:
BRIEF-Oilex Says GSPC Commenced Formal Sale Process For Its 55% Interest In Cambay PSC

Stock Markets Sep 30, 2019 07:30

© Reuters. BRIEF-Oilex Says GSPC Commenced Formal Sale Process For Its 55% Interest In Cambay PSC Sept 30 (Reuters) - Oilex Ltd : * OILEX LTD - GUJARAT STATE PETROLEUM CORPORATION HAS COMMENCED ITS FORMAL SALE PROCESS FOR ITS 55% PARTICIPATING INTEREST (PI) IN CAMBAY PSC * OILEX LTD - PROCESS WHICH WILL FACILITATE RECOMMENCEMENT OF AN ACTIVE WORK PROGRAMME AT CAMBAY IS NOW WELL UNDERWAY * OILEX LTD - OILEX HOLDS A FIRST RIGHT OF REFUSAL WHERE GSPC DISPOSES OF ITS 55% INTEREST IN CAMBAY PSC

BRIEF-Oilex Says GSPC Commenced Formal Sale Process For Its 55% Interest In Cambay PSC
description: BRIEF-Oilex Says GSPC Commenced Formal Sale Process For Its 55% Interest In Cambay PSC
